text: James Boag's Premium is a brand of Tasmanian beer from Boag's Brewery and was first released in 1994. It is a European style lager brewed using pilsner malts and fermented at a lower temperature than most Australian lagers, employing an extended maturation period. It currently has an ABV of 4.6%. It was originally 5.0%. ==Awards== * 1997-2008: Gold medal – International Monde Selection * 2007: Crystal Prestige Award – International Monde Selection * 2001-2005: Premium Beer of the Year – Australian Liquor Industry Awards * 2005: Gold medal – New Zealand International Beer Awards * 2000: Gold medal – Australian International Beer Awards ==See also== *Australian pub *Beer in Australia *List of breweries in Australia *Tasmanian beer ==References== ==External links== * Boag's Brewery Category:Australian beer brands Category:1994 establishments in Australia Category:Products introduced in 1994 Category:Kirin Group
title: James Boag's Premium
